channel.title: Adding more to certain commands?
channel.description: Ok, I just need help with a few things. The first is a does it mater were commands are places in client.java? Next goes alone with the first thing, I found a working ::commands on another sourse, does it matter where I place that? Lastly, how do I put things into the quest tab that when you click on it, it gives you message? Errr, that's it for now, TY for anyone that helps.

item.title: Adding more to certain commands?
item.description:
@11167 wrote:

  1. Under public void customCommand

  2. Same place

  3. The sendQuest method allows you to show text on certain lines. That’s what you’ll use.

Read full topic

item.title: Adding more to certain commands?
